name: AstRollnaut
description:
AstRollnaut is a fast paced sci-fi platformer all about exploration! 

It was created during the 2022 GMTK Game Jam with the theme "Roll the Dice". In this game, Cosmonaut Lucky - an adventurer, gambling addict, and cosmonaut - has to escape the strange time loop on planet Chronotopos with the help of his luck and the power of some random dice rolls!

---------------------------------------

Controls 

Keyboard: WASD/Arrow Keys to move, Space to Jump

Controller: Left analogue stick to move, A/B to jump

---------------------------------------

Goal: Explore the vast Chronotopos  and search for magic dice! Dice give or remove abilities like double jump or wall jump, change stats like luck or speed, and modify the surrounding environment. Collect as many as you can as fast as you can in order to help you climb upwards and reach Lucky's Spaceship.

Time loop: Whenever your time runs out or lucky dies, the time loop resets and you are spawned back at the start. 

---------------------------------------

Credits:

  • Megagon - Team Lead, Programming, Art, Level Design, Game Design
  • Jackson "Xykrotik" Harris - Sound Design, Music Mastering, Narrative, Level Design, Game Design
  • Cycles - Lead Artist
  • Thomas Gneiting - Music (Composition and Mixing), Narrative, Level Design, Game Design
  • Dan Barnett - Cheerleader (Great Morale Booster!)
